abstract_summ: The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) caused by SARS-CoV-2 has developed since December 2019 . It has caused a global pandemic with more than three hundred thousand case fatalities . Remdesivir, teicoplanin, hydroxychloroquine (not in combination with azithromycin), and ivermectin might be effective antiviral drugs . Tocilizumab might be considered as the supplementary treatment for patients with cytokine release syndrome .
